title: Quid
short: A web application to create, share and play quizzes!
description: Quid is a web application to create, share and play quizzes.
It is made with Vue.JS / TailwindCSS for the web interface, and Express / Prisma for the internal API.
This application is still in development, but you can already try it out at the link below!
The source code is available on GitHub, if you want to contribute or just take a look at it.
